get_player_name

Source: R/player_functions.R
get_player_name.Rd

This function fetches a player's full name given FPL ID. If blank, the function fetches all current players.

get_player_name(playerid = NULL)

Arguments

playerid

The player's FPL ID. You can list multiple, e.g. with c().

Examples

get_player_name(playerid=300)
#>     playername  id
#> 1 Dwight Gayle 300

get_player_name(playerid=150:160)
#>              playername  id
#> 1      Cheikhou Kouyaté 150
#> 2          Martin Kelly 151
#> 3      Luka Milivojevic 152
#> 4           Jordan Ayew 153
#> 5         Wilfried Zaha 154
#> 6       Jeffrey Schlupp 155
#> 7          Jack Butland 156
#> 8       Jairo Riedewald 157
#> 9         Jaroslaw Jach 158
#> 10 Jean-Philippe Mateta 159
#> 11         Eberechi Eze 160
